# Displaying Tables


```{python}
import plotly.express as px
from itables import show

tips = px.data.tips()
show(tips)
```

# Displaying Plots


```{python}
px.violin(tips, x="tip", y="sex")
```

# Displaying Static Plots

```{python}
px.violin(tips, x="tip", y="sex")
```
